Comment.Language: In the presence of the Pope, a metropolitan, or a bishop, the following may be chanted:

Text.Language: Csop nemak n~je ]ar,/ qen p~e~hoou n~te tekjom qen v~ouwini n~te n/eyouab: e~bolqen y~neji qajwf m~piciou n~te han a~tooui a~nok aij~vok.
With You is the Rule in the Day of Your power, in the brightness of the holy ones. From the womb, before the morning star, I have begotten You.

Comment.Language: If a bishop is present, the following verse is added.

Text.Language: Nem pefkes~v/r n~litourgoc n~a~poctolikoc peniwt eyouab n~dikeoc (3) abba (nim).
And his partner in the apostolic liturgy, our holy righteous father Abba (...).

Comment.Language: Then he continues with the following.

Text.Language: V] n~te t~ve efe~tajrof hijen pefy~ronoc n~hanm/s n~rompi nem hanc/ou n~hir/nikon.
May the God of heaven keep him on his throne for many years and peaceful times.
